title: Serious Help needed for Seat Surrendering
content: Does anyone has any email id or any contact no. Of one of the higher authorities in The college? I have sent the documents through courier, the last date of surrender is 7th July and 9th July is the 1st Iteration Of Bits, there is a small chance i might get msc so any help in extension of seat surrendering date would be helpful, i was reading they charge 2k per day if crossed the surrender date please if any senior or anyone can help me regarding this that would be really appreciated.

comments.body: Any seniors who can help or any leads kindly respond it would be very helpful 🙏
These are front desk people they wouldn’t be able to help at all, still i have mailed them let’s see
just call them, no need to visit college for that. and no, its not easy to get higher management numbers and all
